attributes.action: make cannabis/cannabis based drugs legal and available on NHS prescription to people suffering chronic pain and other ill health.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cannabis and cannabis based drugs are proven to be of great benefit to people suffering from chronic pain and illnesses such as cancer and Multiple Sclerosis (MS) in Canada, some US states and other countries.
As the law currently stands, cannabis is illegal in the UK and cannot be prescribed on the NHS.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make cannabis/cannabis based drugs legal and available on NHS prescription to people suffering chronic pain and other ill health."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
